attributes.title: SOFIA THE FIRST
attributes.review: I woke up today and my dog had turned into a cat and the cat scratched my face and then my brothers arm stated creaking. Then the app opened I saw an Oompa Loompa but then I realized it was just the awful president so I closed the app and deleted it but then my cat dog ate my brothers arm off so we had to go to the store and buy a new one but the store was soled out so now my brother is armless.

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with hopes of rewarding myself where I very well received the opposite. Almost like the app was working against me and trying to make my entire life turn upside down. Please do yourself a favor and rate this app as 1 star so we can remove it from the Apple Store and save others!

Do better.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, I got a notification that said the app could sense that I was brown. I continually got notifications stating that I either delete the app or get deported. Honestly, this was so unexpected and I thought better of our great leader. If I could give this app less than one star I would.
